color_psychology.description: The psychological and spiritual significance of colors in tarot symbolism
color_psychology.quote: Colors are the smiles of nature, and each color speaks a universal language that transcends cultural boundaries.
color_psychology.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

red.spiritual_significance: Divine will in action, life force energy, creative power
red.quote: Red is the color of life, of blood, of fire - it is the most dynamic of all colors and speaks to our primal nature.
red.author: Faber Birren
red.meditation_use: Activating personal power and life force energy

orange.spiritual_significance: Creative expression, emotional warmth, social connection
orange.quote: Orange combines the energy of red and the happiness of yellow, creating a vibrant expression of joy and creativity.
orange.author: Angela Wright
orange.source: The Beginner's Guide to Color Psychology

yellow.spiritual_significance: Illumination, wisdom, mental clarity, divine light
yellow.quote: Yellow is the color closest to light itself, representing the illumination of consciousness and the joy of enlightenment.
yellow.author: Rudolf Steiner
yellow.meditation_use: Developing mental clarity and spiritual illumination

green.spiritual_significance: Heart-centered consciousness, healing, natural harmony, growth
green.quote: Green is the color of life itself, representing the perfect balance between heaven and earth, spirit and matter.
green.author: Max Lüscher
green.meditation_use: Opening the heart chakra and connecting with nature

blue.spiritual_significance: Divine truth, spiritual communication, infinite consciousness
blue.quote: Blue is the color of infinite space, representing the vastness of divine consciousness and the depths of spiritual truth.
blue.author: Wassily Kandinsky
blue.meditation_use: Enhancing communication and accessing higher wisdom

indigo.spiritual_significance: Mystical perception, inner vision, connection to cosmic consciousness
indigo.quote: Indigo is the color of the deep night sky, representing the mysterious depths of consciousness and cosmic wisdom.
indigo.author: Alice Bailey
indigo.meditation_use: Developing psychic abilities and spiritual insight

violet.spiritual_significance: Divine connection, spiritual transformation, cosmic consciousness
violet.quote: Violet is the color of transmutation, representing the transformation of the soul and connection to divine consciousness.
violet.author: Charles Leadbeater
violet.meditation_use: Connecting with divine consciousness and spiritual transformation

white.spiritual_significance: Pure consciousness, divine light, spiritual perfection, unity
white.quote: White contains all colors and represents the pure light of divine consciousness from which all creation emanates.
white.author: H.P. Blavatsky
white.meditation_use: Purification and connection to divine light

black.spiritual_significance: The void, mystery, protection, absorption of negativity, death/rebirth
black.quote: Black is not the absence of color, but the presence of all possibilities - the fertile darkness from which all life emerges.
black.author: Carl Jung
black.meditation_use: Grounding, protection, and connecting with the void

gray.spiritual_significance: Balance between light and dark, wisdom through experience

color_combinations.description: The interaction and meaning of color combinations in tarot imagery
color_combinations.quote: Colors never appear in isolation but always in relationship to other colors, creating harmonies and tensions that speak to the soul.
color_combinations.author: Josef Albers

red_green.tarot_example: The Lovers card - passion (red) balanced by heart wisdom (green)
red_green.spiritual_meaning: Integration of desire with spiritual growth
red_green.psychological_effect: Creates visual vibration and emotional intensity

blue_orange.tarot_example: Temperance - divine communication (blue) with creative flow (orange)
blue_orange.spiritual_meaning: Heavenly wisdom expressed through earthly creativity

yellow_purple.tarot_example: The Star - mental illumination (yellow) with spiritual vision (purple)
yellow_purple.spiritual_meaning: Integration of rational mind with mystical experience
yellow_purple.psychological_effect: Stimulates both mental and spiritual faculties

red_yellow_blue.meaning: Primary colors representing fundamental life forces
red_yellow_blue.tarot_application: Complete energy system in Major Arcana
red_yellow_blue.spiritual_significance: Body, mind, and spirit in perfect balance

orange_green_violet.spiritual_significance: Emotional, heart, and crown chakra alignment

color_therapy.description: Therapeutic applications of color in spiritual and psychological healing
color_therapy.quote: Color is a power which directly influences the soul, awakening spiritual vibrations and promoting healing on all levels.
color_therapy.author: Wassily Kandinsky

warm_colors.tarot_correlation: Fire and Earth suits for grounding and activation

cool_colors.tarot_correlation: Water and Air suits for emotional and mental balance

red_light_therapy.tarot_meditation: Focus on red elements in Strength or Magician cards
red_light_therapy.precautions: Avoid with high blood pressure or agitation

blue_light_therapy.tarot_meditation: Focus on blue elements in High Priestess or Star cards
blue_light_therapy.precautions: May increase depression in some individuals

green_healing.method: Green light visualization or nature immersion
green_healing.tarot_meditation: Focus on green in Empress or heart-centered cards

cultural_color_meanings.description: How different cultures interpret colors in spiritual and symbolic contexts

gemstone_color_healing.description: Using colored gemstones for energy work and healing with tarot
gemstone_color_healing.quote: Gemstones are crystallized light, holding within their structure the healing vibrations of specific color frequencies.
gemstone_color_healing.author: Melody

red_stones.tarot_application: Place on cards with red imagery for enhanced energy

orange_stones.tarot_application: Enhance creative interpretations and emotional insights
orange_stones.chakra_work: Sacral chakra healing and creative flow

yellow_stones.tarot_application: Clarify mental aspects of card meanings
yellow_stones.chakra_work: Solar plexus empowerment and mental clarity

green_stones.chakra_work: Heart chakra opening and emotional healing

blue_stones.tarot_application: Enhance communication and truth in readings
blue_stones.chakra_work: Throat chakra expression and truth speaking

indigo_stones.tarot_application: Enhance psychic and intuitive aspects of readings
indigo_stones.chakra_work: Third eye activation and psychic development

purple_stones.chakra_work: Crown chakra connection and spiritual awakening
